description: DSM-specific hooks for data-source-manager - enforces FCP patterns, silent failure detection, and code quality
notes: SessionStart: Loads FCP context into every session
UserPromptSubmit: Suggests relevant skills based on prompt keywords
PreToolUse: BLOCKS dangerous operations (cache deletion, wrong Python)
PostToolUse: WARNS about silent failure patterns (bare except, no timeout)
Stop: Final validation and summary at session end

SessionStart.description: Load FCP context (cache → Vision → REST priority) at session start

UserPromptSubmit.description: Suggest relevant DSM skills based on prompt keywords

PreToolUse.description: Block dangerous Bash commands: cache deletion, pip install, force push, wrong Python

PostToolUse.description: Detect silent failure patterns: bare except, no timeout, naive datetime

Stop.description: Final validation: summarize session changes and verify code quality
